meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: Social media keeps old friends close, but the Web used to be for strangers.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12fZwZG&via=Digg&text=Don't Be A Stranger

div.a: World's First Printed House May Look Like A Giant Fossil

div.div: Architects have finished the plans for a nylon residence that they say can be printed in three weeks and assembled in just a day. Does anyone have an empty lot lying around?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11GR71T&via=Digg&text=World's First Printed House May Look Like A Giant Fossil

div.a: Why Does Your Arm Fall Asleep?

div.div: Here's a super quick explainer on why your arm falls asleep.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/V8MmLU&via=Digg&text=Why Does Your Arm Fall Asleep?

div.a: F-35's Pilots Get Iron Man Targeting Upgrade

div.div: You probably have heard about the magical visualization system in the F-35 that feeds all kinds of data to pilots using demon helmets. Now it just got a new feature that makes it indistinguishable from Tony Stark's visor: hostile ground fire detection. Check out this cool—and real life—test.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WHpvWh&via=Digg&text=F-35's Pilots Get Iron Man Targeting Upgrade

div.a: The Screwing Of IndyCar's Newest Female Driver

div.div: Katherine Legge did everything that was asked of her on the track and off the track. So why'd she get screwed out of her job?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YeaitA&via=Digg&text=The Screwing Of IndyCar's Newest Female Driver

div.div: When influenza hit early and hard in the United States this year, it quietly claimed an unacknowledged victim: one of the cutting-edge techniques being used to monitor the outbreak.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Z9Zj9t&via=Digg&text=When Google Got Flu Wrong

div.a: Photographer Captures Detailed Photos Of The Sun From His Backyard

div.div: Alan Friedman of Buffalo, New York is an amateur astrophotography enthusiast who captures amazing photographs of the Sun through a telescope in his backyard.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VaCH7A&via=Digg&text=Photographer Captures Detailed Photos Of The Sun From His Backyard

div.a: How The Pirate Bay Founders Got Caught

div.div: The Pirate Bay documentary TPB AFK chronicles the co-founders' trial — a trial that might not have happened if one of them had encrypted his hard drive.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XMsJWk&via=Digg&text=How The Pirate Bay Founders Got Caught

div.a: Vince Vaughan And Owen Wilson Attempt To Land Google Internships In New Comedy

div.div: This is happening whether you like it or not.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VV5GXS&via=Digg&text=Vince Vaughan And Owen Wilson Attempt To Land Google Internships In New Comedy

div.a: The 20 Most Important Restaurants In America

div.div: These aren't the fanciest, trendiest, or even the best restaurants. They're the places that drive chefs to innovate, restaurateurs to imitate and the rest of us to line up.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/127zo34&via=Digg&text=The 20 Most Important Restaurants In America

div.a: Google Engineers Found Over Half The Bugs In Microsoft's Latest Security Update

div.div: 32 of 57 vulnerabilities identified in this month's massive update were reported by researchers at the rival company.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XKC7tu&via=Digg&text=Google Engineers Found Over Half The Bugs In Microsoft's Latest Security Update

div.a: American Airlines And US Airways Boards Approve Merger

div.div: The boards of American Airlines parent AMR Corp. and US Airways Group Inc. late Wednesday separately voted to approve a merger that would create the world's largest airline, said people familiar with the matter.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VVtGde&via=Digg&text=American Airlines And US Airways Boards Approve Merger

div.a: 13 Men Condemned To Die Despite Severe Mental Illness

div.div: If juveniles and intellectually disabled people are ineligible for execution, why not paranoid schizophrenics?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WJusy4&via=Digg&text=13 Men Condemned To Die Despite Severe Mental Illness

div.div: Sometimes you have to look down to see what’s right in front of you.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XA5nkH&via=Digg&text=Spying On Mexico’s Carpoolers

div.a: Disabled Driver Stuck At 125 MPH For Over An Hour, Avoids Crashing

div.div: Frank Lecerf was on his way to the supermarket at 60 MPH when his Renault Laguna's brakes failed and the car suddenly accelerated to 125 MPH. Amazingly, one hour later and one country away, the car harmlessly ran out of gas and came to a stop in a ditch.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14StJwp&via=Digg&text=Disabled Driver Stuck At 125 MPH For Over An Hour, Avoids Crashing

div.a: All The Deaths In Quentin Tarantino's Movies, Charted

div.div: Quentin Tarantino and violence go together like elderberry wine and arsenic—they’re made for each other.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WJnLfr&via=Digg&text=All The Deaths In Quentin Tarantino's Movies, Charted

div.div: COME ON, WIRED, IT'S A TRAP!
A symposium on the Battle of Hoth.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14SO7NJ&via=Digg&text=Defense Nerds Strike Back

div.a: Tesla Vs. The New York Times

div.div: The New York Times recently ran a terrible review of the shiny new Tesla Model S, which Tesla CEO Elon Musk has lambasted as a "hit piece." In the ensuing controversy, everyone is missing the bigger lesson: road trips are a dangerous myths for the EV industry to perpetuate at all.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14RhMqN&via=Digg&text=Tesla Vs. The New York Times

div.a: 'You Are Gay,' 'Fax Me,' 'Let's Read,' And More Retired Sweetheart Candy Sayings

div.div: The Sweetheart is 147 years old. But not all of its cute little sayings have enjoyed quite the same sesquicentennial longevity.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YdC6ym&via=Digg&text='You Are Gay,' 'Fax Me,' 'Let's Read,' And More Retired Sweetheart Candy Sayings

div.div: It's pretty obvious that there are some serious gear heads working on the "Archer" animation team. Here are some of the cars used in the show.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/a7Ut0j&via=Digg&text=The Cars Of 'Archer'

div.a: Pentagon To Start Awarding Medals For Drone Strikes And Cyberattacks

div.div: Drone pilots are about to start getting medals and awards, just like their brethren in-theater: theatlanticwire.com/nation...

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YdMaqS&via=Digg&text=Pentagon To Start Awarding Medals For Drone Strikes And Cyberattacks

div.a: Joe Arpaio Hired Convicted Child-Sex Criminal For Armed School 'Posse'

div.div: After Sandy Hook, the Arizona sheriff sent his gun-toting "posse" -- and a sex offender -- to patrol local schools.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X3nx10&via=Digg&text=Joe Arpaio Hired Convicted Child-Sex Criminal For Armed School 'Posse'

div.a: The Nazi Bunker Sitting Under A Paris Train Station

div.div: Unbeknownst to the thousands of passengers that pass through the station each day, right under their feet, between platforms 2 and 3 at the Gare de l’Est lies an old concrete World War II bomb shelter.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Vg6kSz&via=Digg&text=The Nazi Bunker Sitting Under A Paris Train Station

div.div: THE DAILY MAIL WAS MADE FOR THIS STORY

Passengers on board the stranded Carnival cruise ship are reaching breaking point as conditions become so hellish that they are forced to go to the bathroom in plastic baggies while many are becoming physically sick due to the stench of human waste.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14SvPwi&via=Digg&text=The Cruise From Hell

div.a: If We Caught The Earth-Buzzing Asteroid, It'd Be Worth $195 Billion

div.div: Asteroid mining company estimates value of passing space rock, even though catching it would be out of the question.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X1Ot16&via=Digg&text=If We Caught The Earth-Buzzing Asteroid, It'd Be Worth $195 Billion

div.a: The Many Faces Of Ted Nugent During The State Of The Union

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12M3fhv&via=Digg&text=The Many Faces Of Ted Nugent During The State Of The Union

div.a: The 18-Year-Old Whose Smartphone Watch Could Beat Apple's iWatch To Market

div.div: Simon Tian says he has in-hand a working prototype of something nearly unprecedented in consumer electronics: a smartphone the size of a watch.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XzXEqC&via=Digg&text=The 18-Year-Old Whose Smartphone Watch Could Beat Apple's iWatch To Market

div.a: Did The Police Deliberately Set Fire To Dorner's Cabin?

div.div: It is not yet clear how the fire at the cabin was started, but some evidence suggests that the police purposely used tear gas as an incendiary device.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/X4xKvf&via=Digg&text=Did The Police Deliberately Set Fire To Dorner's Cabin?

div.a: How The Phone Numbering System Came And Went

div.div: Believe it or not, you couldn't always just open your phone app and dial a contact. Here's how dialing went from named exchanges to voice dialing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WhZGKU&via=Digg&text=How The Phone Numbering System Came And Went

div.div: This kid gives a hilarious Final Jeopardy answer and wins $75,000. He’s having a good day.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XA0Te3&via=Digg&text=Teen Wins Instant-Classic 'Final Jeopardy' Round

div.div: CBS exclusive shows intense gun battle, fiery end.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/15c1GsS&via=Digg&text=Intense Footage Of Dorner Firefight
